data.question: What is the phosphorus analogue of DMF synthesized in the study?
data.answer: P,P-dimethylformylphosphine, Me2PC(H)O

data.question: Which computational methods were used to analyze the electronic structure of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine?
data.answer: DFT with BP86 and B3LYP functionals, MP2, and B3LYP with Grimme's D3 dispersion correction and Becke-Johnson damping

data.question: What was the observed barrier to rotation around the P–C(O) bond in P,P-dimethylformylphosphine compared to DMF?
data.answer: The barrier to rotation around the P–C(O) bond in P,P-dimethylformylphosphine is significantly lower than in DMF

data.question: True or False: The ground state structure of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine features a planar phosphorus center.
data.answer: False

data.question: What was the method used to synthesize the anion [Ph3GePC(H)OBPh3]−?
data.answer: The anion [Ph3GePC(H)OBPh3]− was synthesized by reacting KHBPh3 with Ph3GePCO at ambient temperature in THF

data.question: How was the isolated yield of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine calculated?
data.answer: The isolated yield was calculated via integration of 31P NMR spectra using triphenylphosphine as an internal standard

data.question: True or False: The P–C(O) bond rotation in P,P-dimethylformylphosphine is facilitated by the multiple bonding character of the C–N bond in DMF.
data.answer: False

data.question: What was the main challenge in isolating compound 2 from the reaction mixture?
data.answer: The main challenge was the formation of multiple products and impurities, making it difficult to separate compound 2

data.question: True or False: The ground state structure of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine has a pyramidal phosphorus center.
data.answer: True

data.question: What was the effect of photolysis on P,P-dimethylformylphosphine?
data.answer: Photolysis did not lead to clean decarbonylation; instead, multiple unidentified products were formed

data.question: True or False: Solutions of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine in THF show signs of decomposition after weeks in the freezer.
data.answer: False

data.question: What was the observed effect of exposing P,P-dimethylformylphosphine to air?
data.answer: P,P-dimethylformylphosphine proved to be stable to the presence of water in solution and THF solutions are stable many hours upon exposure to ambient air

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine is amenable to scale up.
data.answer: True

data.question: What was the role of [NBu4][Ph3SiF2] in the synthesis of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine?
data.answer: It served as a fluoride source, facilitating the methylation at phosphorus and subsequent formation of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine

data.question: True or False: The computational study highlighted the similarities and differences between the P- and N-containing molecules of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine and DMF.
data.answer: True

data.question: What was the computational prediction for the 31P NMR chemical shift of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine?
data.answer: The computational prediction for the 31P NMR chemical shift of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine ranged from -10 ppm to -16 ppm, depending on the method used

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of the anion [Ph3GePC(H)OBPh3]− involved the use of pyrophoric and toxic reagents.
data.answer: False

data.question: What was the role of 18-crown-6 in the synthesis of the anion [Ph3GePC(H)OBPh3]−?
data.answer: 18-crown-6 was used to form a complex with potassium, facilitating the formation of [K(18-crown-6)][1] and aiding in the crystallization process

data.question: True or False: The barrier to phosphine inversion in P,P-dimethylformylphosphine is lower than the barrier to P–C(O) bond rotation.
data.answer: False

data.question: What was the observed stability of P,P-dimethylformylphosphine upon exposure to oxygen?
data.answer: Upon exposure to oxygen, P,P-dimethylformylphosphine formed a major unidentified product displaying an AX spin system, indicating some reactivity
